name: VETEoMUERE
description:
You control the character trapped in a haunted house and you must find the key to the exit door before you run out of time. The ghosts are hiding the key and will do everything they can to prevent you from finding it. There are clues scattered around the house, written on the walls and other places, that will help you find the Key.

If you download and try it, please feel free to throw your critical darts and point out EVERYTHING you don't like or think is wrong, even flaws or personal preferences.

THANK YOU!
